subject: Pro Plus Pedal Manual
description_text:
Hello.
I buy Simsonn Pro Plus Pedals. Where I can download PDF manual? 
Link https://download.simsonn.com/manual return 404 error.
Thanks.

conversations.body_text: Hi Nikita Burakov, You can refer to the PlusX user manual for guidance.Â       https://cdn.simsonn.vip/download/SIMSONN_Plus_X_EN.pdf
